channel.title: baking on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in baking on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Gingerbread
item.description: 8ozs plain flour 1 egg 3ozs butter 3ozs brown sugar 1 tablespoon treacle 1 tablespoon golden syrup 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon bread soda 1 teaspoon ground ginger a little milk [sour, if possible] Sieve flour, salt, ginger and bread soda, free from lumps, into a bowl Melt the butter, treacle, syrup and sugar over a very low heat. Don’t allow to become hot, only warm
